info.name: The BioWare Forum
info.description: Improves readability of default white theme. Dark equivalent: style 98677. Consider installing this Greasemonkey script for functional improvements.
info.additionalInfo:
<dl>
<dt>2014-03-01</dt>
<dd>Font size increases on thread summary.</dd>
<dd>Apply to HTTPS.</dd>

<dt>2014-02-28</dt>
<dd>Font size increases on profile and settings page.</dd>

<dt>2014-02-27</dt>
<dd>Apply to post previews.</dd>
<dd>Dark theme available.</dd>

<dt>2014-02-26</dt>
<dd>Affects more places (groups, PMs, status updates).</dd>
<dd>Work-around for occasionally inconsistent HTML when quoting.</dd>

<dt>2014-02-25</dt>
<dd>Initial release.</dd>
</dl>
